languages.text: "Не прибивал, это был несчастный..." {n}Работник осекается и, съежившись, скулит:{/n} "Им размозжило головы ящиками! Мертвым пайки ни к чему!"
"I didn't do them in, it was an acc—" {n}The worker stops himself, cowers, and whimpers,{/n} "They got their heads bashed in by crates! The dead don't need rations!"
languages.original_text: "Не прибивал, это был несчастный..." {n}Работник осекается и, съежившись, скулит:{/n} "Им размозжило головы ящиками! Мертвым пайки ни к чему!"

traits.locale_text: "I didn't do them in, it was an acc—" {n}The worker checks himself, cowers, and whimpers,{/n} "They got their heads bashed in by crates! The dead don't need rations!"
"I didn't do them in, it was an acc—" {n}The worker checks himself, cowers, and whimpers,{/n} "They got their heads bashed in by crates! The dead don't need rations!"

"I didn't do them in, it was an acc—" {n}The worker stops himself, cowers, and whimpers,{/n} "They got their heads bashed in by crates! The dead don't need rations!"
"I didn't do them in, it was an acc—" {n}The worker stops himself, cowers, and whimpers,{/n} "They got their heads bashed in by crates! The dead don't need rations!"

languages.text: «No me los he cargado, ha sido un acci...». {n}El trabajador se calla a media palabra, se cubre con los brazos y gimotea:{/n} «¡Les cayeron cajas en la cabeza! ¡Los muertos no necesitan raciones!».
languages.original_text: "I didn't do them in, it was an acc—" {n}The worker stops himself, cowers, and whimpers,{/n} "They got their heads bashed in by crates! The dead don't need rations!"

traits.locale_text: «No me los he cargado, ha sido un acci...». {n}El trabajador se calla a media palabra, se cubre con los brazos y gimotea:{/n} «¡Les cayeron cajas en la cabeza! ¡Los muertos no necesitan raciones!».

languages.text: 「そんなことはしてません、あれは事故…」{n}労働者は言葉を止め、怯えて泣きじゃくる。{/n}「あいつらは木箱に頭をつぶされたんだ！死人に配給は必要ない！」
languages.original_text: "I didn't do them in, it was an acc—" {n}The worker stops himself, cowers, and whimpers,{/n} "They got their heads bashed in by crates! The dead don't need rations!"

traits.locale_text: 「そんなことはしてません、あれは事故…」{n}労働者は言葉を止め、怯えて泣きじゃくる。{/n}「あいつらは木箱に頭をつぶされたんだ！死人に配給は必要ない！」

languages.text: “我根本没害死他们，那完全是事故——”{n}工人住了口，畏缩着，呜咽着。{/n}“他们的脑袋被板条箱砸烂了！反正死人也不需要口粮！”
languages.original_text: "I didn't do them in, it was an acc—" {n}The worker stops himself, cowers, and whimpers,{/n} "They got their heads bashed in by crates! The dead don't need rations!"

traits.locale_text: “我根本没害死他们，那完全是事故——”{n}工人住了口，畏缩着，呜咽着。{/n}“他们的脑袋被板条箱砸烂了！反正死人也不需要口粮！”

languages.text: "Ich habe mich ihrer nicht entledigt, es war ein Unf..." {n}Der Arbeiter hält inne, kauert sich zusammen und winselt.{/n} "Kisten haben ihnen den Schädel eingeschlagen! Tote brauchen keine Rationen!"
languages.original_text: "I didn't do them in, it was an acc—" {n}The worker stops himself, cowers, and whimpers,{/n} "They got their heads bashed in by crates! The dead don't need rations!"

traits.locale_text: "Ich habe mich ihrer nicht entledigt, es war ein Unf..." {n}Der Arbeiter hält inne, kauert sich zusammen und winselt.{/n} "Kisten haben ihnen den Schädel eingeschlagen! Tote brauchen keine Rationen!"

languages.text: « Je les ai pas refroidis, c'était un acc... » {n}L'ouvrier s'interrompt. Il se fait soudain plus petit et reprend d'une voix geignarde.{/n} « Il se sont pris une caisse sur la tête ! Les morts ont pas besoin de rations ! »
languages.original_text: "I didn't do them in, it was an acc—" {n}The worker stops himself, cowers, and whimpers,{/n} "They got their heads bashed in by crates! The dead don't need rations!"

traits.locale_text: « Je les ai pas refroidis, c'était un acc... » {n}L'ouvrier s'interrompt. Il se fait soudain plus petit et reprend d'une voix geignarde.{/n} « Il se sont pris une caisse sur la tête ! Les morts ont pas besoin de rations ! »

languages.text: "Onları ben öldürmedim, kaza ol..." {n}İşçi, konuşmasını yarıda keserek korkudan siniyor ve sızlanmaya başlıyor.{/n} "Kasaların altında kaldılar, kafaları ezildi. Ölülerin kumanyaya ihtiyacı yoktur!"
languages.original_text: "I didn't do them in, it was an acc—" {n}The worker stops himself, cowers, and whimpers,{/n} "They got their heads bashed in by crates! The dead don't need rations!"
